title: Protecting Your Privacy
description: Learn why and how to manage privacy settings.

content.story: Alex receives a friend request from someone they don't know. While checking their profile settings, Alex discovers that their posts are visible to everyone! Alex also witnesses a classmate being mean to another student in the comments. What should Alex do in both situations?

sections.title: Profile Visibility
sections.content: Set your profile to private so only friends can see your posts, photos, and personal information. Review who can find you using your email or phone number.

sections.title: Post Sharing Controls
sections.content: Before posting, choose who can see it: Public, Friends, or Custom groups. Remember that even 'friends only' posts can be screenshot and shared.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: Hide your phone number and email from your public profile. Be selective about who can contact you directly through the platform.

data.question: Which of the following is a recommended action when witnessing cyberbullying?
options: Report the incident and support the victim
data.explanation: Supporting victims and reporting abuse creates a safer online space.
